title: Based on past pandemics, coronavirus will bring changes to buildings and cities
itunes:title: Based on past pandemics, coronavirus will bring changes to buildings and cities
description: Pandemics can bring about innovation, especially in design and architecture. Sam Lubell talks to DnA about changes that may come to buildings and urban design in response to COVID-19.
itunes:summary: Pandemics can bring about innovation, especially in design and architecture. Sam Lubell talks to DnA about changes that may come to buildings and urban design in response to COVID-19.

content:encoded: Pandemics can bring about innovation, especially in design and architecture. Sam Lubell talks to DnA about changes that may come to buildings and urban design in response to COVID-19.
